website_summaries.verdict: Smaller-sized wheeled cooler that's perfect for tailgating events.
pros: Great for tailgating events and transporting groceries
Smaller size can be stored easily in a closet or car trunk when not in use
Smaller pockets store keys, phones, and wallet
Can fit up to 36 cans plus ice
cons: Must be kept upright or else it can easily leak due to the zippered top pocket

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and wanted to use this for all of the stuff I have to lug around between home and school. (Don’t care that it’s a cooler. Though that may be handy for something one day.) The cart I had before was too big/bulky. Other ones I’ve looked into are too expensive. This is nice and compact and sturdy, and I love that it has a front zippered section and TWO mesh drink holders (for my water and travel coffee mug). It’s just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: the kool kid

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 3 months ago and I really enjoyed it while it worked, but about a week ago it got a leak and I couldn't clean it out for a couple of hours. When I finally was able to it was too late, it smells like mildew and I've clean it 3 times and cannot get the smell away. So it smells and no longer works, and it's too late to return it now. Definitely won't buy again, I'd rather spend a little more money and get something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Esparza

customer_reviews.title: This cooler is awesome. I used it on a trip and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is awesome. I used it on a trip and it kept my water.cold for 2 days. Love that it had wheels and it rolls really good, even on carpet. This was a great buy...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Beechy

customer_reviews.title: Cannot day enough good about this item
customer_reviews.text: Cannot day enough good about this item. This came in so handy for us!!! We packed it in a suitcase (it collapses) for a family vacation. We out our own beverages and food in it each day rather than paying the high prices at a resort. It’s on wheels so easy, easy, easy to transport. We have also used it at home several times to take food items and drinks to pot lucks, neighbors houses etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chera L. Greene

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. You’ve been warned.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. It leaked the very first day. I bought this for my daughter to take to day camp and it leaked everywhere. Buy this at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Burgin

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler on May 11 and ripped after only having it for a month , bad quality , bad material .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This cooler on wheels is very,very,very cheap as in quality, I used it 3x and it leaked every time, I am a dyalisis patient and needed a cooler to take my lunch in with a little bit of ice. It has caused more damage than the thing is worth Someone slipped on the leaking water and caused then to go to hospital, I did not know it was leaking since I only had it a few days
customer_reviews.author: Uuu

customer_reviews.title: Update -excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update- customer service reached out to me to fix the problem and ended up sending me a replacement, which is exactly as described, would order from this seller again The front feet are missing, so it won’t standby right. I didn’t realize it until I pulled it out for my trip that’s tomorrow 😕
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA G

customer_reviews.title: Leaked on first use.
customer_reviews.text: Used it last night for the first time. Put in a 10lb bag of ice and 12 drinks. Noticed water forming around the front right leg. I thought at first the water was on the floor before I placed the cooler in that area. In a matter of minutes the ice began to melt and a large area the water was all on the floor from the leak in the bottom of the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I had great hopes for this ice chest. I had purchased a similar one at Costco several years ago, and hoped this one would be as sturdy and last just as long. I was very disappointed. While it is a pretty color and pattern, it is very thin and not a sturdy product. Most importantly, the first time I used it, the melted ice inside the ice chest leaked all over my car!! UGH!!! I wish I could return it, but the date I first used it was already past the return date. This ice chest needs a liner!! I DON'T LIKE WASTING MY MONEY! I recommend not wasting yours and finding a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Silva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Love the storage compartments. Lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherLadybug

customer_reviews.title: Great for concerts at The Bowl!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for specific reasons- Taking this to the Hollywood Bowl, had to fit under the bench (15 inch height), the soft zipper top allowed this; the handle allowing easy rolling uphill. It satisfied both... perfect for the Bowl! Perfect fit under bench, fit two large ice packs , tall water bottle and several food items. Negative- doesn't do a real good job of keeping items cold. The handle doesn't extend easily, maybe a defect as only one side did this. I recommend to a friend and she purchased two.
customer_reviews.author: Amers

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but needs some improvement
customer_reviews.text: I loved the weight and easy to roll. You cannot use ice as it leaks through the cooler. You have to use the ice that is enclosed in plastic which doesn’t keep drinks as cold as regular ice.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, broken within weeks.
customer_reviews.text: We have a camper at a seasonal spot and I bought this to take food from the refrigerator back and forth. With gentle and minimal use the stands under the cooler that hold it upright broke right off, showing how cheaply it is made.
customer_reviews.author: NeoIsNotAPro

customer_reviews.title: Gem of a cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cooler I have had. Big enough for everything I need for a day out. Love the wheels and handle, saving my back from straining and the best part is that it collapses completely, great for apartments with little closet or storage space. Is very easy to assemble and very sturdy, is even easier to collapse it for storage . I bought it from Amazon Warehouse it was labeled as used but it is new in original packaging and condition, It saved me $8.00 from original price. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: It is great for once in awhile use.
customer_reviews.text: The handle needs to extend more. Any one taller than 5' 6" would definitely have a problem with it. I use this bag every day because of my disabilities. I hate it and like it at the same time. The bag rolls on its side for some reason. I am not able to run or walk at an excessively fast pace and I make sure the bag is balanced. It is the perfect size and I like the handle on the zippered lid. So there is the good and the bad of it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Donlin-Sriver

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rolling cooler. I'm using it to transport my breast pump and milk from work every day. It has a nice size zip pocket on the front and net pockets on the sides. The cooler is tall. it not extremely wide and fits all my supplies, pump, a large ice pack, expressed milk and some drinks and keeps them all cold all day with the ice pack. Do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Penton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular one because it was so light weight. I know that means it is not very strong, so I treat it gently. I have bursitis in both shoulders and need to transport bulky, but not very heavy stuff back and forth to work. Carrying it in a shoulder bag was making my shoulders really sore. This works great. With all my stuff in it I can still lift it into my car without hurting my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: sbwertz

customer_reviews.title: just OK
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is light weight and has plenty of space for two people. It tips over a lot and does not roll well in the sand or on the grass. It was difficult dragging it to my spot on the beach. Ice melts relatively quickly in this cooler so I do not think it was a very good purchase. It works ok but I wish I would have bought something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when you buy a used item this one was terrible
customer_reviews.text: I was very upset to get this product I know I brought it use but it was filthy and torn I have to throw it away I have brought other products was used and they always came out beautiful but this bag was terrible
customer_reviews.author: frida gonzalez- ndongeni

customer_reviews.title: Would certainly purchase this again
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. It's really cute number one. Number two I was able to put it together myself without any help. Number three the handles extended far enough for me to be comfortable. Number 4 area on the outside is a plus well. All in all I would purchase this again , going to use soon at Silver Dollar City in Branson Missouri, just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Betty Byrom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic storage idea for the arts & crafts person!
customer_reviews.text: I have searched a while looking for a storage container that would fit my many tools, beads and wires and so happy I stumbled upon this! The dimensions can hold 7 plastic jewelry organizers (10.75"x7"x1.75") perfectly. The front and side pockets are large enough to hold many spools of wire, multiple tools and other jewelry making accessories. The telescoping handle makes it very easy to transport. Very happy with this find!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie A. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Ripped to easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a month ago, I have used it for the beach 4 times and on the 4th time, the bottom of the bag is completely ripped open and cannot be used any longer. I did not drag it across anything rough for it to rip, used the wheels or picked it up where ever it could not be rolled. Did not last at all and the cooler bag does not keep items very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are basically useless
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are way too small and basically useless. Using the handle is essentially dragging a cooler across the ground. If the main reason you want this cooler is because it has wheels-- I would not recommend this at all. The cooler part itself seems okay. I would return this, but the return costs 1/3 of the price and isn't worth the hassle. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Cool but leaks
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice cooler. has the extra pocket in front holders on side which can be helpful. But after using it one time it started leaking a lot. So now I have to put my own lining inside as a temporary fix. That is one main thing I've read in reviews I thought I would give it a try anyway. So it is true. They really need to rectify that part because it is key. other than that it would be a great little cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 Star, but the front legs that keep it from tipping over are attached with Velcro and easily come of when rolling over rough parking lots and door thresholds. Otherwise, I use it for carrying wine samples for work and it’s sturdy enough to hold 4-6 wine bottles as long as I’m careful where I roll it. Love the pockets on the sides too for napkins and bottle openers. Plus my paperwork folder fits perfectly in the zippered front pocket. Great little bag!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Epps

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Leaks like crazy, but it's well worth the money if you don't want to have a hard sided Coleman or igloo cooler (for the same price at big box stores) Holds an entire 30 rack + Ice, with more room for other things (koozies, sunscreen) in the second pocket. Meets motorsport gate regulations for coolers (Indy 500, NASCAR)
customer_reviews.author: Jordie L.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great cooler but it DOES NOT come with feet on the bottom front so it cannot stand up. It just falls forward to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: Weak legs.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one use. The leg just snapped. Poor quality. Ordered a replacement because it is cute, but it was going to take over a month. Just cancelled. I’ll find something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and so lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for summer evening concerts in the park- Because it has the soft sides, it holds a TON! and still fits in the sports car! The top is flat, so I can even attach my portable wine cooler/bag to the top and it maneuvers like a dream! LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara A Ranville

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: This sucks! It leaks!!!! I didn’t use it until a month after I bought it so now I’m stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler has survived it all and seen me through my worst. From floating the river, crashing my friends boat, countless pool parties, and bonfires - this cooler is great for any occasion. It fits about 36 cans with ice.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S

customer_reviews.title: Best beach 🏖 cooler!! And I’m a pro!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 5 of these!!! I use them for the beach they’re terrific!!! I’ve also segued some to my mom to help w groceries !!!!! They work great and are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: kathy Q

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cooler for an out door street event. Cooler was easy to assemble, the pattern is pretty, and I was able to lay 2 bottles of Champagne on the bottom, 4 bottles of water and poured a whole bag of ice over them. Later that day, I was still able to store a container of food I bought, minus 1 bottle water. Left ice in cooler all night in my bedroom, no leaks! The handle was STUCK!!! My husband was able to pull it up to its full height!!
customer_reviews.author: Luvette Conerly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fold up and down easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the size -- it's perfect for public transport. HOWEVER - to fold it up, you have to take off the legs on the bottom. So it's not quickly collapsible. You have to 'unbuild' it. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: hvg

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love the cooler but don't like the fact that it has leaked since day 1. Other than the leaking part, I didn't have any other issues but that was big enough...looking for another cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Material made out of
customer_reviews.text: In the description is it day may cause cancer But on the label it says that Not too happy about that
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great portable carrier
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my portable sewing machine. Fits great and cushions it well. If I need more cushion I drape a towel or a baby blanket over it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbybsw

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this I put a bag of ice inside. I poured it out of the plastic bag and straight into the cooler. We ended up being gone all day and when I got home I was tired and didn’t empty it out right away. Many hours later I went to empty it and there was nothing but water. I expected to find a mess with water everywhere. The area was completely dry and I poured all the water out in the sink. You gotta get this!!
customer_reviews.author: Bailee Garcia

customer_reviews.title: WEAK
customer_reviews.text: i USED THE BAG ONE TIME AND THE LEG BROKE. IT'S NOT STRONG. I ONLY HAD WATER AND SOME ICE IN IT
customer_reviews.author: L. Tiburcio

customer_reviews.title: Handle is too short.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The handle is short and therefore is hard to maneuver. I used it twice and don't think I will be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Patty951

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of movement for the wheels. Wheels need to move in any direction. Used as a lunch cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Exum

customer_reviews.title: Will hold tall bottles
customer_reviews.text: I always travel with a cooler and was tired of carrying them, so I order this and so glad I did. I got 4 bottles of wine 3 bottles of tea and 6 bottles of other drinks in this and the outside has storage for bags of nuts. Was prefect.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Leaked but I still liked it for other uses.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this item as an ice chest as it leaked IMMEDIATELY. We had to use a trash bag as a liner. However, I love the lightweight of it and that it breaks down. It has many uses other than a cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Schovajsa

customer_reviews.title: Broke twice in the first 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Update- worst thing I’ve ever bought. Broke twice in the first 20 minutes. Item came with a few ugly stains. No time to return before I need to use it, or else it would be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cooler for the pool/beach or even the grocery store, the design is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Elliott

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: This cooler broke in three days. I take a cooler to work for a special diet so I needed it for daily use and now it sits sideways. The cooler itself keeps my food and drinks I have to have cold with my ice packs for my whole 12 hr day
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep things cold
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great size but if you want to keep things cool don’t buy this! It also leaks if you have any type of ice in it good for other things but not for food and drinks
customer_reviews.author: Elle G

customer_reviews.title: Hard to drain
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Ice seamed to melt quick. No way to drain unless you tilt. Hard to drag on sand. But big for price
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch box!! I no longer have to carry my food and drinks to work. I just roll right in!! Lol I do not put ice in it due to the reviews I read. I freeze a water bottle and or add an igloo in it and it keeps my other bottles cold all work day (8-9 hours).
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Florida

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small typos very light and easy to handle!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Shanklin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a day long tournament
customer_reviews.text: My son fences, and this is perfect for his snacks/lunch/drinks. Really a good size for 1 person, wouldn't really recommend it for a family to fill. Easy to carry along with this fencing gear, not to cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Not Well Insulated
customer_reviews.text: Cooler is convenient but the condensation around the cooler gets really bad that makes the area wet with just by the condensation. Not well insulated.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cooler on wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, wonderful, Compact, and perfect! Saves my shoulders which is the best! The wheels stood up to even long walks on rough concrete! I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri G.

customer_reviews.title: Considerably smaller than stated
customer_reviews.text: The real dimensions inside, (but not much less than outside, as material is about 1/4”) are considerably smaller than stated. They are H13-1/2” x W11-1/2” x Depth 8-1/2”. Also the front is rounded which makes for even less space. Seems sturdy enough for the money but I can’t use it do to it being too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for concerts in the park a block down from my street and the wheels are already cracked. Only used 3 times :( but too late to return I guess!
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Used the cooler and it was just perfect. Lightweight, lots of storage space and easy to pull. I highly recommend this cooler. Thought the price was fair and delivery quick.
customer_reviews.author: PorscheLover

customer_reviews.title: Few stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m a tennis player and thought this would be perfect for travel. Unfortunately the cooler is not sturdy the Velcro bottom doesn’t stay on well and the cooler is poor quality. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dixee Darling

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem with rolling or extending the handle like some others have posted. Good quality. I have only used it once so far. No leakage at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amiee Nicole DeNiro

customer_reviews.title: great for the train
customer_reviews.text: my wifes takes this on the train, its not too large, perfect for her handbang and food, keeps it perfectly insulated.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Used this cooler at the beach. Kept my beverages cold all day. Wheels work great in the sand. And has a handle to lift it up, if needed. I bought one 7 years ago and I wanted this one in the new color so bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Average cooler
customer_reviews.text: A little more flimsy than expected. Still worked fine for vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I use it for multi purposes. Lunch and work, reducing several items to carry
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Conveinent, but leaks
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt hold water. If you put real ice, instead of ice packs in here it will leak! Appreciate the size and wheels but dont use indoors!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for a day at the lake or pool. It glides on wheels so if you have a distance to walk you don’t have to carry like a cooler. Fits just enough products and keeps them cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ghunwa Charafeddine

customer_reviews.title: Broken wheels after using it
customer_reviews.text: Broken wheels within a few months of it. Two thumbs down for this one 👎👎
customer_reviews.author: JoJo G.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have not actually used this yet, so cannot comment on how well it keeps things cool. The Velcro tabs that keep the bottom stabilizer on don’t reach to where I think they should go.
customer_reviews.author: Nonny

customer_reviews.title: Cooler inside
customer_reviews.text: I just went to use my cooler for the first time and the bottom piece that lays down has a cut in it. I would like a replacement one please.’
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: I use this for my yarn
customer_reviews.text: I use this to carry my yarn and it works great for that!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Green

customer_reviews.title: Nothing compares to Amazon service!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my needs. I have horrible neck and back issues/pain, but this pull-along case will hold my heavy purse, makeup bag, etc., yet is still on the smaller side and not conspicuous. Thanks so much for the truly immediate delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Evanko

customer_reviews.title: A bit small
customer_reviews.text: You can push or pullWhich is great. I replaced another one becuz I want black. It has minimum pockets. It is very nice but smaller than I expected. Using it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: CHERI K JONES

customer_reviews.title: Not extending extension handle...
customer_reviews.text: The handle has 3 positions... down, mid, and fully extended. The fully extended position worked 1 time. It would only go to the mid position, which allows no one in our family the ability to roll it along 😞. Sort of defeats the purpose of a rolling cooler. We are sending back for refund and reordering. Hopefully, it was just a glitch.
customer_reviews.author: Baltimore Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy Food Prep Travel
customer_reviews.text: Usually I travel with a large shoulder bag with all my competition food prepped for shows. My back and shoulder end up tired, sore and bruised. This time I decided it would be much easier to have one with wheels. Absolutely love this bag it was much easier to maneuver through airport. I would like to see it available with spinner wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Happily Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I like both of the products! I have been wanting each of them for a while and I’m glad I took the leap and ordered. The items arrived when I was told they would and I couldn’t be any happier.
customer_reviews.author: 17 Made 17

customer_reviews.title: Great little cooler
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described, easy to put together and easy to pull. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne F

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy handling
customer_reviews.text: I use plastic ice packs to keep food cold and to avoid any leak, it is compact and easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food cold.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use for road trips, fits snugly in the small trunk. Keeps food cool for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: That it be functional.
customer_reviews.text: Parts are missing. Bag falls over. There are no feet on the bottom..picture shows feet in front on bottom..please send feet or new bag.. I love it but falls over and spills..
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wickham

customer_reviews.title: Worth consideration
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and color of this cooler. It’s great that it’s on wheels, except it does not roll well if you are in an area with a lot of stones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick weekends!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, nice large cooler main storage area with easy access, extra exterior pockets and good sturdy wheels and handle.
customer_reviews.author: Nate P.

customer_reviews.title: Leaky cooler
customer_reviews.text: I used this cooler on vacation this past week and it's new and it's already leaking. The 1st time we used it, it was leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smallest extended handle ever
customer_reviews.text: Unless you’re a midget or under 4’9 this is good for you. Not ment for people taller then 4’9. I literally laughed at how small the extended handle was.
customer_reviews.author: Truthful review

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a rolling office. Light weight, rolls easily, fits in my tiny trunk space.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini cooler. I needed something small to take to my daughter's softball games, and this is perfect. It keeps our drinks nice and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for going to the pool.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps stuff cool, if you have good ice packs. It’s not a yeti but it also doesn’t cost as much as a used car.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little cooler
customer_reviews.text: Filled with ice and bottled water and spent 5 hours on the beach in Florida in 90 degree temperatures. Kept drinks cold and even had ice remaining at the end of the day. Only down side is the handle could be a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: threerivers40

customer_reviews.title: Good,Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is good product. My 5 and 7 years-old grand children help me rolling this cart when we have picnic at the park. It is easy to carry with the handle if you don’t want to roll it. It is good and sturdy, good looking also. Thanks to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Borom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beach bag
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for using as a beach bag. Everything fits in it and the only thing I have to carry is my chair.
customer_reviews.author: Gina L. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Not for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Melts ice quickly. Easier to pick it up and carry it instead of rolling it. Not ideal for the beach. Smaller than I thought, even though I got the extended version.
customer_reviews.author: Belverly Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use mine to take stuff to and from work including lunch and beverages. It's just what I needed sizewise. The one button collapsible handle is great. Easy to lift in and out if the car with the handle on top. Price was right for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Merriweather

customer_reviews.title: It is exceedingly useful to assist me
customer_reviews.text: Transport my blanket and accessories to Dialysis treatment 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: h. b. douglas

customer_reviews.title: This was very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hospital and go from unit to unit, to see patients. I used this to carry my information that I share. I used it for 2 weeks and the plastic that holds the wheels snapped, and the wheel and housing for the wheel, fell off. This was being used of flat surfaces, and it was not heavily loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Angela R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Indy 500
customer_reviews.text: If you need a cheap, small cooler to take in to IMS this is the one for you. Size requirements were on par and held up well for the walk we put it through. In fact, it survived and we'll be able to use it again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: We had other travel bags, but none were as durable and most leaked after some use. None of those issues with this travel bag!
customer_reviews.author: pattersonm

customer_reviews.title: Sweet cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love it. We are flying to Florida and this cooler is perfect. I can use it as a carry on bag. Sweet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Msredhead

customer_reviews.title: Love the removable floor bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, compact so easy to pack lunch and water for work. Nice for the price for sure! Big enough but not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler right before the Summer and just recently brought it on a road trip. Using it only twice, the bottom piece broke off and I am now unable to exchange for a new one since I missed my window.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Smaller Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. It is smaller than I thought and I don’t think you can fit the amount of cans as advertised but if you and a couple/ three friends are headed to the beach, it is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, cute color and graphics, not too big.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put My lunch in for work, meds, etc. it folds up and just slides into the fridge. Great if You have a long walk into work from Your car like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Casey

customer_reviews.title: Easy, no assembly needed!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bc it's easy to push and it's great for a day in the park! ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Young

product_meta.title: dbest products Ultra Compact Cooler Smart Cart, Red Insulated Collapsible Rolling Tailgate BBQ Beach Summer
product_meta.description: Color:Red| Size:StandardPack the ultra compact cooler smart cart with groceries food drinks or whatever you need to keep fresh. Why haul a heavy bulky cooler when you can put more in your cooler smart cart and simply pull it along with you not only is the ultra compact cooler smart cart cool looking but it is also smart. It rolls where you roll but when you don't need it simply fold it up and store it. This multi-purpose folding basket is perfect and convenient for anyone on the go! unlike an ordinary cart this cooler cart has wheels and an extendable handle for easy maneuverability. It has a large front zipper pocket for easy access items and securely store keys phone and wallet. This cart folds down for compact storage. It weighs less than 3 lbs.A Lightweight option to the standard ice chest.
feature_bullets: Weighs less than 3 lbs.Folds Flat for storage. useful for light trips to the grocery. Keeps your ice cream and popsicles chilled to its fullest. Locking telescoping handle for comfort and stability when pulling or pushing this wheeled tote.
This soft-sided cooler is a fully insulated leak-proof cooler that fits 36 cans plus ice cubes.Carry anything from sodas,beer,wine bottles ,sandwiches,chips and other snacks.
Extra large side Mesh pockets and beverage holders. Large front zipper pocket for easy access securely store keys, phone and wallet and other personal items.
Great for Barbecues and pool parties. Keep it in your patio to have your refreshments at hand. Dimensions are 13 1/2" X 13 1/2" X 10 3/4" It holds 4 gallons in volume.

Travel outdoors with this collapseble cooler. Perfect for camping, fishing,picnics,hiking ,a day at the beach,bonfires, long road trips,trips to the zoo, boating and to your kids sports games. Nice small design makes it great use as a lunchbox.
